charges.charge_description: Deft conspire and agree to obstruct, delay and affect interstate commerce and the movement of articles and commodities in such commerce by robbery, in that the defendants, namely, U.S. currency in possession of Krogers, a business which affects interstate commerce by means of actual and threatened force and fear of injury and during the course of committing the aforesaid offense and in furtherance of said offense, the defendants possessed a firearm; In violation of 18 USC 1951 &; 924(c);

charges.charge_disposition: 63 months on Cts 1, 2 &; 4 to run concurrent followed by a consecutive term of 84 months on Ct 3 for a total of 147 months; 3 yrs SRT on all counts, all to run concurrently; $2,000 fine; $400 SA
